snippet.title: The Next Big Thing: Official Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
More info on : http://www.thenextbig-game.com/

Cinematic Launch Trailer for The Next Big Thing

Just two weeks prior to release, we invite you to view the official trailer for The Next Big Thing, the new adventure game from the creators of the famous Runaway series.

An homage to the game's classic Hollywood setting, this preview is edited like a real movie trailer, giving players a closer look at the classy (and clash-y) pair of heroes!

For the next two minutes, dive into the hectic and kooky lives of Dan Murray and Liz Allaire. Their relationship is as interesting as the adventure they'll share, a mystery filled with laughs, crazy characters and all kinds of puzzles.

http://www.thenextbig-game.com
